name: Memory Target vs Memory Usage
description: This PromQL query compares the memory target usage recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) with the actual memory usage of each container.
question: What is the target memory usage recommended by the VPA for each container?

name: Memory Target vs Memory Usage
description: This PromQL query compares the memory target usage recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) with the actual memory usage of each container.
question: How does the actual memory usage of each container compare to the recommended target?

name: Memory Target vs Memory Usage
description: This PromQL query compares the memory target usage recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) with the actual memory usage of each container.
question: Are the containers exceeding or falling short of the memory target set by the VPA?

name: VPA Memory Recommendations vs Requests and Limits
description: This PromQL query measures the recommendation of the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) and compares it to the requests and limits of all containers in a pod.
question: What is the recommended memory for containers by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler?

name: VPA Memory Recommendations vs Requests and Limits
description: This PromQL query measures the recommendation of the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) and compares it to the requests and limits of all containers in a pod.
question: What are the memory limits set for containers in a pod?

name: VPA Memory Recommendations vs Requests and Limits
description: This PromQL query measures the recommendation of the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) and compares it to the requests and limits of all containers in a pod.
question: What are the memory requests specified for containers in a pod?

name: CPU Target vs CPU Usage
description: This PromQL query measures the target CPU usage recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) alongside the actual CPU usage of each container.
question: What are the target CPU usage recommendations from the VPA?

name: CPU Target vs CPU Usage
description: This PromQL query measures the target CPU usage recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) alongside the actual CPU usage of each container.
question: How does the actual CPU usage of each container compare to the recommended target?

name: CPU Target vs CPU Usage
description: This PromQL query measures the target CPU usage recommendations provided by the Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) alongside the actual CPU usage of each container.
question: Are there any containers exceeding the recommended CPU usage?
